languages.text: {n}В ответ вы слышите неразборчивые голоса — кто-то шепчет, кто-то стонет, кто-то смеется над вами... ярость полыхает в вашей груди, и вы хватаетесь за осколок, что жадно впивается в вашу ладонь острым краем.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}В ответ вы слышите неразборчивые голоса — кто-то шепчет, кто-то стонет, кто-то смеется на вами... ярость полыхает в вашей груди, и вы хватаетесь за осколок, что жадно впивается в вашу ладонь острым краем.{/n}

languages.text: {n}All you hear in response is unintelligible voices — whispers, moans, and derisive laughter... Anger ignites your chest, and you clutch the shard, which ravenously bites into your palm with its sharp edge.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}В ответ вы слышите неразборчивые голоса — кто-то шепчет, кто-то стонет, кто-то смеется над вами... ярость полыхает в вашей груди, и вы хватаетесь за осколок, что жадно впивается в вашу ладонь острым краем.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}In the response, you hear unintelligible voices: some are whispering, some are moaning, and the others are laughing about you... Anger burns in your chest, and you clutch the shard ravenously biting into your palm with a sharp edge.{/n}

{n}In the response, you hear unintelligible voices: some are whispering, some are moaning, and the others are laughing about you... Anger burns in your chest, and you clutch the shard ravenously biting into your palm with a sharp edge.{/n}

{n}In response, you hear unintelligible voices — whispers, moans, and derisive laughter... anger burns in your chest, and you clutch the shard, which ravenously bites into your palm with its sharp edge.{/n}

{n}In response, you hear unintelligible voices — whispers, moans, and derisive laughter... anger burns in your chest, and you clutch the shard, which ravenously bites into your palm with its sharp edge.{/n}

{n}All you hear in response is unintelligible voices — whispers, moans, and derisive laughter... Anger ignites your chest, and you clutch the shard, which ravenously bites into your palm with its sharp edge.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你只听到了难以理解的声音回应着你的话语——窃窃私语、呻吟与嘲弄的笑声……怒火在你胸中熊熊燃烧。你紧紧抓住碎片，碎片锋利的边缘如饥似渴地啮咬着你的手掌。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}All you hear in response is unintelligible voices — whispers, moans, and derisive laughter... Anger ignites your chest, and you clutch the shard, which ravenously bites into your palm with its sharp edge.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你只听到了难以理解的声音回应着你的话语——窃窃私语、呻吟与嘲弄的笑声……怒火在你胸中熊熊燃烧。你紧紧抓住碎片，碎片锋利的边缘如饥似渴地啮咬着你的手掌。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pour toute réponse, vous ne percevez que des murmures inintelligibles, des gémissements et des rires moqueurs... Une vague de colère embrase votre poitrine et votre poing se crispe sur le fragment acéré qui vous entaille la paume.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}All you hear in response is unintelligible voices — whispers, moans, and derisive laughter... Anger ignites your chest, and you clutch the shard, which ravenously bites into your palm with its sharp edge.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pour toute réponse, vous ne percevez que des murmures inintelligibles, des gémissements et des rires moqueurs... Une vague de colère embrase votre poitrine et votre poing se crispe sur le fragment acéré qui vous entaille la paume.{/n}

languages.text: {n}聞こえてくるのは意味不明な声だけだった。ささやき、嘆き、嘲笑…胸の中で怒りが燃え盛る。あなたは破片を握りしめた。それは鋭い切っ先をあなたの手のひらへと、貪欲に食い込む。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}All you hear in response is unintelligible voices — whispers, moans, and derisive laughter... Anger ignites your chest, and you clutch the shard, which ravenously bites into your palm with its sharp edge.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}聞こえてくるのは意味不明な声だけだった。ささやき、嘆き、嘲笑…胸の中で怒りが燃え盛る。あなたは破片を握りしめた。それは鋭い切っ先をあなたの手のひらへと、貪欲に食い込む。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La única respuesta que recibes son unas voces incomprensibles: susurros, gemidos y risa desdeñosa... La cólera arde en tu pecho y te aferras al fragmento, que clava su borde afilado en la palma de tu mano.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}All you hear in response is unintelligible voices — whispers, moans, and derisive laughter... Anger ignites your chest, and you clutch the shard, which ravenously bites into your palm with its sharp edge.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La única respuesta que recibes son unas voces incomprensibles: susurros, gemidos y risa desdeñosa... La cólera arde en tu pecho y te aferras al fragmento, que clava su borde afilado en la palma de tu mano.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Als Antwort hörst du nur unverständliche Stimmen ... Flüstern, Stöhnen, spöttisches Lachen ... Zorn flammt in deiner Brust auf und du umklammerst den Splitter, der mit seiner scharfen Kante hungrig in deine Handfläche beißt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}All you hear in response is unintelligible voices — whispers, moans, and derisive laughter... Anger ignites your chest, and you clutch the shard, which ravenously bites into your palm with its sharp edge.{/n}

{n}Als Antwort hörst du unverständliche Stimmen — Flüstern, Stöhnen, spöttisches Lachen ... Zorn flammt in deiner Brust auf und du umklammerst den Splitter, der sich mit seiner scharfen Kante hungrig in deine Handfläche beißt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Karşılık olarak anlaşılmaz birtakım sesler; fısıltılar, iniltiler ve alay dolu kahkahalar duyuyorsun... Öfke, göğsünü tutuşturuyor. Keskin kenarıyla avcunu ısırıp yırtmaya çalışan parçayı kavrıyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}All you hear in response is unintelligible voices — whispers, moans, and derisive laughter... Anger ignites your chest, and you clutch the shard, which ravenously bites into your palm with its sharp edge.{/n}
